name: Astral Sorcery
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

The theme of the game jam is: "Joined Together".

Description:

You are a powerful wizard, joining together the stars to call upon ancient astral magic and defeat waves of enemies.

How to play:

Enemies will attack you in groups of three. Use your spellbook to utilize the correct spells to defeat them.

Use your mouse to form the correct constellations, don't take too much damage.

Have fun!
